jobs_results.title: CDI - D√©veloppeur iOS (F/H/X)
jobs_results.description:
At Sephora we inspire our customers, empower our teams, and help them become the best versions of themselves. We create an environment where people are valued, and differences are celebrated. Every day, our teams across the world bring to life our purpose and values.

You will excel and thrive in this position if you are ready to :

‚Ä¢ Perform unit testing and collaborate closely with Test Analysts to ensure the technical viability of developed systems and solutions.
‚Ä¢ Conduct technological watch, propose technical topics aimed at improving app performance.
‚Ä¢ Create technical documentation on Confluence.
‚Ä¢ Participate in workload estimation exercises and commit with the rest of the team to delivering a functional scope in each iteration.
‚Ä¢ Report blocking issues to Leads Dev/Scrum Master.
‚Ä¢ Mentor junior developers in skill development and best practices.
‚Ä¢ Continuously evolve best development practices and promote the culture and implementation of DevOps within the team.

Don't hesitate to apply if you possess the following skills:
‚Ä¢ Swift langage

‚Ä¢ Moya
‚Ä¢ MVVM, Clean Architecture
‚Ä¢ XCTest

‚Ä¢ Dedicated to product quality and safety, meticulous, passionate, committed, and responsible for deliverables

While at Sephora, you‚Äôll enjoy‚Ä¶

‚Ä¢ The culture. As a leading beauty retailer within the LVMH family, our reach is broad, and our impact is global. At Sephora we are a community of 52,000 passionate team members across 34 markets and 3,000+ stores.

You can unleash your creativity, because we‚Äôve got disruptive spirit. You can learn and evolve, because we empower you to be your best. You can be yourself, because you are what sets us apart.

_____________________

‚Ä¢ R√©diger de la documentation technique sur Confluence
‚Ä¢ Participer aux exercices d'estimation de charge et s'engager avec le reste de son √©quipe sur un p√©rim√®tre fonctionnel √† livrer √† chaque it√©ration
‚Ä¢ Remonter aux Leads Dev / Scrum Master les points de blocages
‚Ä¢ Accompagner les d√©veloppeurs juniors dans la mont√©e en comp√©tence et les bonnes pratiques
‚Ä¢ Faire √©voluer constamment les bonnes pratiques de d√©veloppements et promouvoir la culture et la mise en place du DevOps au sein de l‚Äô√©quipe

N‚Äôh√©sitez plus √† postuler si vous avez les comp√©tences suivantes :

‚Ä¢ Moya

Et si vous √™tes
‚Ä¢ Dipl√¥m√©(e) d‚Äôune formation d‚Äôing√©nieur BAC+5 ou √©quivalent avec 5 ans d‚Äôexp√©rience minimum en tant que d√©veloppeur iOS

Chez Sephora, vous appr√©cierez...

jobs_results.title: Senior Software Engineer, iOS
jobs_results.description:
At Sorare, we bet on passionate and innovative people! Are you looking for an empowering environment to grow professionally and personally? Join us in this tremendous adventure!

Our Mission

Sorare is a fantasy sports gaming experience and marketplace featuring officially licensed digital player cards. With Sorare you build legacy teams ‚Äì buying, selling, collecting and trading player cards -- and compete with them in free-to-play fantasy games to win rewards week over week and season over season, just like a professional sports owner.

Sorare is revolutionizing digital sports fandom, and now has over 3,5 million users across 180 countries. More than 300 iconic teams, clubs, and organizations including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, MLS, NBA, NBPA, MLB, MLBPA, and many others have partnered with Sorare to build the next sports entertainment giant.

Our Journey

Sorare was founded by Nicolas Julia and Adrien Montfort in 2018 in Paris to bring sports fans across the globe closer to the players, teams, and leagues they love.

With 130-plus employees across France and US, Sorare is one of Europe‚Äôs fastest-growing startups and recently raised a $680 million Series B funding round from world-class investors including SoftBank, Accel, and Benchmark. Sorare also has athletes Serena Williams, Zinedine Zidane, Rio Ferdinand, Antoine Griezmann, Gerard Piqu√©, Blake Griffin, and Rudy Gobert among its investors, ambassadors, and advisors.

Our Values
‚Ä¢ Own your game: Think and act like an owner, and expect your teammates to do the same. You are an ‚Äúentrepreneur‚Äù empowered to make decisions and own the outcomes.
‚Ä¢ Build with the fans, and for the fans: Have an obsession for high-quality user experiences. Engage our community with transparency to build trust and learn from the fans to deliver effective changes.
‚Ä¢ Run fast: Take bold risks and outpace the competition in an ever changing environment. Have a bias for action (connected to team goals) and strive to ship and iterate.
‚Ä¢ Have fun and bring joy: Sports have the power to unite people around the world, and as fans ourselves, we believe it is a privilege to work in this industry.
‚Ä¢ Win as a team: We are all in this together as one team, win or lose. Inspire your teammates to always be better.

Please note that Sorare is a hybrid work company; employees are required to be in office 3 days a week.

Sorare is seeking a Senior Software Engineer to join the iOS team. Sorare‚Äôs iOS team plays a critical role across the entire company by developing the premier Blockchain-Fantasy-Sport iOS application.

As a Senior Software Engineer, your primary objective will be to architect and develop sophisticated enhancements for our existing application, elevating its functionality and user experience to new heights. Your expertise will guide the integration of cutting-edge features, ensuring seamless and innovative improvements to our platform. Sorare is a collaborative and team oriented environment.

As a Senior Software Engineer at Sorare, you will :
‚Ä¢ Drive complex projects from inception to launch
‚Ä¢ Work with product managers, designers, and backend engineers to execute on our roadmap
‚Ä¢ Implement pixel perfect designs with advanced animations and flows
‚Ä¢ Design and build toward optimal solutions to tough technical problems
‚Ä¢ Care deeply about security, performance, and maintainability
‚Ä¢ Help design and build our mobile infrastructure

The ideal candidate:
‚Ä¢ You have +5 years of experience within software engineering
‚Ä¢ You have excellent spoken and written communication skills in English
‚Ä¢ Experience developing and shipping high-quality iOS products
‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with Swift and UIKit (bonus if experienced with SwiftUI or other Rx frameworks)
‚Ä¢ Have production experience working with REST or GraphQL APIs
‚Ä¢ Independent, curious and highly motivated to explore novel solutions with a growing team in a challenging space
‚Ä¢ Attention to detail: you strive for the high quality from top to bottom
‚Ä¢ You are a team player who collaborates with empathy and respect
‚Ä¢ You have an entrepreneurial spirit, demonstrating a proactive approach to problem-solving and decision-making.
‚Ä¢ You take accountability as a self starter who can work independently towards objectives

Our Hiring Process
‚Ä¢ Step 1: Recruiter Screen (30 min)
‚Ä¢ Step 2: Hiring Manager Screen
‚Ä¢ Step 3: Case Study + Panel interviews
‚Ä¢ Step 4: Reference Check & Offer

Sorare is an equal opportunity employer committed to an inclusive and diverse workplace. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to: race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran status, disability status, or any other basis prohibited by law.

As we are an international company, please note we speak English in the workplace. Please apply for the role with an English CV so we can process your application.

jobs_results.title: Junior IOS Mobile Developer
jobs_results.description:
About Dreem:
Each and every night, around the world, hundreds of millions of people are trying to sleep but can‚Äôt(e)We‚Äôre in the middle of a global sleep crisis with serious ramifications for society(e)At Dreem, a team of 50 experts is on a mission to beat insomnia and build the sleep medicine of tomorrow.
In the 7 years since Dreem‚Äôs creation, we‚Äôve collected 2M nights of sleep data and helped thousands of people improve their sleep. We also accumulated 25 patents and completed 4 full hardware iterations and 100s of software iterations. We raised $60M from investors including Laurent Alexandre, Xavier Niel, MAIF, BPI and Johnson & Johnson - the world‚Äôs healthcare leader(e)Along the way we created a research network of 250 leading laboratories and hospitals and a scientific board with some of the most renowned neuroscientists and sleep experts in the world.
Dreem is a fast-paced and dynamic work environment(e)The team‚Äôs fields of expertise encompass sleep research, neuroscience, mechanical engineering, machine learning, electronic design, embedded systems, testing, ergonomics, development of proprietary applications and software, design, and much more(e)Joining the team is challenging but hugely rewarding- working at Dreem means pushing the boundaries and being able to bring real positive change to people around the world(e)Ready to join the fight for better sleep?

SPECIFIC CONTEXT

Dreem has been building a digital sleep clinic, providing comprehensive patient care to answer the growing needs of people suffering from sleep disorders - from screening, diagnosis, to the treatment of insomnia and apnea(e)By facilitating access to remote care, while improving diagnosis and treatment methods, the Dreem clinic is a unique alliance of advanced technology and sleep medicine, providing US payers with lower costs, improved clinical performance, and increased patient satisfaction(e)

Dreem digital sleep clinic services are also used in the context of clinical trials by 250 research labs - including the Harvard Medical School, Brown University, Stanford University, Bard College, and 10 pharmaceutical companies(e)

We are supported by a prestigious medical advisory board, with four of the most renowned neuroscientists and sleep experts in the world: Dennis Hwang, RaphaeÃàl Heinzer, Emmanuel Mignot and Jean-Louis PeÃÅpin(e)

To grow this activity, Dreem is reinforcing the software team to grow mobile app development.(e)In this light, we are looking for a shiny mobile developer(e)

You will be part of the Mobile team, consisting of 2 native mobile developers, both iOS and Android(e)You will report to the Head of Software who is part of this team.
Your missions
‚Ä¢ Building iOS applications in Swift
‚Ä¢ Ensure code quality, sustainability and low level of technical debt of developments
‚Ä¢ Produce code easily testable and well tested (unit, integration, performance, ...)
‚Ä¢ Work closely with our product and design team to craft the best experience possible
‚Ä¢ Stay up-to-date with the latest changes for iOS and incorporate them into our application

Required
‚Ä¢ Fluent in Swift
‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of iOS SDK and how to deal with different screen sizes
‚Ä¢ Ability to create modules/libraries and integrate third party SDKs and libraries

Appreciated
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of Clean Architecture
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of Reactive programming (e.g(e)RxSwift)
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of Bluetooth
‚Ä¢ Interest in product design and implementation of delightful UI elements
‚Ä¢ A Github repository and/or application(s) on Apple Store
‚Ä¢ Open to develop on Android

Benefits:
- Startup environnement with a young, passionate, smart team.
- Good healthcare provider with ‚ÄúAlan‚Äù
- Luncheon vouchers
- Gymlib passes
- BSPCE participation (for full-time contracts)
- Flexible hours
- Remote working (up to 60% a week)
- Great office in a central location in Paris
- Regular events and parties (breakfast, monthly party, team building, annual summer summit trip...) when the conditions get better
- And of course‚Ä¶ your very own Dreem headband.

Environnement Technique

‚Ä¢ Titulaire d'un Bac +5 en informatique ou √©quivalent, vous justifiez d'au moins 4 ans d'exp√©rience en d√©veloppement mobile iOS.

jobs_results.title: LEAD DEVELOPER IOS (H/F)
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

Notre mission depuis 30 ans ? √ätre pr√©sent au bon moment !‚Äã

Notre expertise ? Accompagner nos clients √† capter l‚Äôattention de l‚Äôutilisateur et transformer cette interaction furtive en une interaction m√©morable. jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
SwiftUI and/or JavaScript developer
jobs_results.description: Our small team has already built a digital whiteboard app for iOS with SwiftUI that is now in TestFlight and the target end user is a teacher or online tutor using the app to teach math to one or more students. We need a developer to help us achieve our next goals and deliver a prototype. We have also been building a special tool that sets the app apart from other digital whiteboards on the market. In short, the user can use images or handwritten text to automatically generate graphs of math equations. Python and JavaScript have been used for the APIs and server-side applications that enable this tool.We are looking for a developer with expertise in JavaScript and/or Swift/iOS development to help refine the app. Your role will include:Debugging and improving existing features and app stabilityOptimizing workflows for seamless user experienceAdding new features to enhance functionalityPreparing and delivering a polished prototype for testing with educators and their students in live teaching sessions Part-time work on freelance contractCompetitive payPossibility of long-term role on project
